tasks.label: flash
tasks.command: esptool.py --port /dev/tty.wch* erase_flash; esptool.py --port /dev/tty.wch* write_flash -fm dio -fs 32m -ff 40m 0x00000 firmware.bin

tasks.label: upload
tasks.command: nodemcu-uploader --port /dev/tty.wch* upload *.lua --verify=sha1; nodemcu-uploader --port /dev/tty.wch* node restart; screen /dev/tty.wch* 115200
